issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Add support for partition pruning
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12438](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12438). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Once we implement

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11019

would be good to add support for partition pruning optimization based on filters / `WHERE` clause.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12438?focusedCommentId=17332411) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-datafusion/issues/204
